text: The Biathlon events at the 2018 Paralympic Winter Games will be held on March 10, 2018, March 13, 2018 and March 16, 2018 at the Alpensia Biathlon Center. There are three types of individual events: * Short distances: Men: 7.5 km (Men) or 6 km (Women) * Medium distances: Men: 12.5 km (Men) or 10 km (Women) * Long distances: Men: 15 km (Men) or 12.5 km (Women) Categories of disabilities for the biathlon include vision impaired (VI), standing physical disability and sitting physical disability. == Medals == Men's events Event Gold Silver Bronze 7.5 km VI Vitaliy Lukyanenko Yury Holub Anatolii Kovalevskyi 12.5 km VI Yury Holub Oleksandr Kazik Iurii Utkin 15 km VI Vitaliy Lukyanenko Oleksandr Kazik Anthony Chalencon 7.5 km Standing Benjamin Daviet Mark Arendz Ihor Reptyukh 12.5 km Standing Benjamin Daviet Ihor Reptyukh Mark Arendz 12.5 km Standing Mark Arendz Benjamin Daviet Nils-Erik Ulset 7.5 km Sitting Daniel Cnossen Dzmitry Loban Collin Cameron 12.5 km Sitting Taras Rad Daniel Cnossen Andrew Soule 12.5 km Sitting Martin Fleig Daniel Cnossen Collin Cameron Women's events Event Gold Silver Bronze 6 km VI NPA Mikhalina Lysova Oksana Shyshkova Sviatlana Sakhanenka 10 km VI Oksana Shyshkova NPA Mikhalina Lysova Clara Klug 12.5 km VI NPA Mikhalina Lysova Oksana Shyshkova Clara Klug 6 km Standing NPA Ekaterina Rumyantseva NPA Anna Milenina Liudmyla Liashenko 10 km Standing NPA Ekaterina Rumyantseva NPA Anna Milenina Liudmyla Liashenko 12.5 km Standing NPA Anna Milenina NPA Ekaterina Rumyantseva Brittany Hudak 6 km Sitting Kendall Gretsch Oksana Masters Lidziya Hrafeyeva 10 km Sitting Andrea Eskau NPA Marta Zaynullina NPA Irina Gulyayeva 12.5 km Sitting Andrea Eskau Oksana Masters Lidziya Hrafeyeva == Medal Table == ===Medal table=== 1 NPA 5 5 1 11 2 4 5 5 14 3 3 0 2 5 4 2 4 1 7 5 2 1 1 4 6 1 2 3 6 7 1 1 4 6 8 0 0 1 1 Total 18 18 18 54 == References == Category:Sports at the 2018 Winter Paralympics Category:Skiing
